paragraphs.text:
%md
# About
**Lab:** Hive Transations (Hive ACID)
**Objective:** Become familiar with using Hive transactions
**File locations:** /tmp/data/dc-wikia-data.csv
**Successful outcome:** Understanding hive transactions and how they are managed in hive tables
**Before you begin:**
**Related lessons:** Transforming Data with Hive

---

%md
# Setup

paragraphs.title: Required for Kerberos operations
paragraphs.text:
%sh

echo $PASS | kinit $USER

%md
# Lab
---

%md
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid_insert **insert transcational** table to store our data.

~~~
 CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid_insert ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 1 - Drop table dc_comics_acid_insert  if it exists
2 - Create and describe the table

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
Next we are going to insert the following three records into our new table **using three insert statements**
```console
1422,Batman (Bruce Wayne),\/wiki\/Batman_(Bruce_Wayne),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,3093,"1939, May",1939
23387,Superman (Clark Kent),\/wiki\/Superman_(Clark_Kent),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,2496,"1986, October",1986
1458,Green Lantern (Hal Jordan),\/wiki\/Green_Lantern_(Hal_Jordan),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Brown Eyes,Brown Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,1565,"1959, October",1959
```

paragraphs.title: 3 - Insert the 3 rows into table dc_comics_acid_insert using 3 insert statements

paragraphs.title: Log into terminal console and into beeline
paragraphs.text:
%md
- ssh -o ServerAliveInterval=120 -i training-keypair.pem centos@ec2-54-191-8-20.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com **( Use the AWS Ambari node address you are assigned.)**
- Type beeline
- Prompt for user type **hive**
- Prompt for password type **hive**

%md
We are going to create a dc_comics_acid **transcational** table to store our data.

~~~
 CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');
~~~

But first we need to drop the table if it already exists.

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the dc_comics_acid table and create the table

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
Next we are going to insert the following three records into our new table **using a single insert statements**
```console
1422,Batman (Bruce Wayne),\/wiki\/Batman_(Bruce_Wayne),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,3093,"1939, May",1939
23387,Superman (Clark Kent),\/wiki\/Superman_(Clark_Kent),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Blue Eyes,Black Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,2496,"1986, October",1986
1458,Green Lantern (Hal Jordan),\/wiki\/Green_Lantern_(Hal_Jordan),Secret Identity,Good Characters,Brown Eyes,Brown Hair,Male Characters,,Living Characters,1565,"1959, October",1959
```

paragraphs.title: 6 - Do a multi-value insert into table

paragraphs.text:
%md
In your terminal console type the command below
```console
show transactions;
```

paragraphs.title: 7 - Query the dc_comics_acid table

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 8 - In the same cell  run three commands concurrently. (Delete where the page_id =23387. Update the dc_comics_acid table Batman record to have the name "Robin" (Dick Grayson). Query the contents of the table

paragraphs.text:
%md
In your terminal console type the command below
```console
show transactions;
```

%md
Type the following statement in the cell below to complete a minor compaction.
```console
ALTER TABLE dc_comics_acid COMPACT 'minor' WITH OVERWRITE TBLPROPERTIES ("tblprops.orc.compress.size"="8192");
```

paragraphs.title: 9 - Complete a minor compact on the table

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
Type the following statement in the cell below to list the compactions.
```console
SHOW COMPACTIONS;
```

paragraphs.title: 10 - Show compactions

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Result
**You have now:** You have now successfully created a Hive transactional table and completed transactions on the table.

---

%md
# Solution
---

paragraphs.title: 1 - Drop table dc_comics_acid_insert  transactional if it exists
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dc_comics_acid_insert;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 2- Create and describe the table
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

 CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid_insert ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true','transactional_properties'='insert_only');

DESCRIBE dc_comics_acid_insert;

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

SELECT * FROM  dc_comics_acid_insert;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: 5 - Drop the dc_comics_acid table and create the table
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS dc_comics_acid;
CREATE TABLE dc_comics_acid ( 
                        page_id string,
                        name string,
                        urlslug string,
                        ID string,
                        ALIGN string,
                        EYE string,
                        HAIR string,
                        SEX string,
                        GSM string,
                        ALIVE string,
                        APPEARANCES int,
                        FIRST_APPEARANCES string,
                        YEAR string
) STORED AS ORC TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');

paragraphs.title: 6 - Do a multi-value insert into table
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT into dc_comics_acid VALUES(1422,"Batman (Bruce Wayne)","\/wiki\/Batman_(Bruce_Wayne)","Secret Identity","Good Characters","Blue Eyes","Black Hair","Male Characters","","Living Characters",3093,"1939, May",1939),(1458,"Green Lantern (Hal Jordan)","\/wiki\/Green_Lantern_(Hal_Jordan)","Secret Identity","Good Characters","Brown Eyes","Brown Hair","Male Characters","","Living Characters",1565,"1959, October",1959),(23387,"Superman (Clark Kent)","\/wiki\/Superman_(Clark_Kent)","Secret Identity","Good Characters","Blue Eyes","Black Hair","Male Characters","","Living Characters",2496,"1986, October",1986);

paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

SELECT * FROM dc_comics_acid;

paragraphs.title: Additional resources
paragraphs.text:
%md
We hope you've enjoyed this lab. Below are additional resources that you should find useful:

1. [Cloudera Tutorials](http://cloudera.com/tutorials.html) are your natural next step where you can explore Spark in more depth.
2. [Cloudera Community](https://community.cloudera.com) is a great resource for questions and answers on Spark, Data Analytics/Science, and many more Big Data topics.
3. [Apache Spark Documentation](https://spark.apache.org/documentation.html) - official Spark documentation.
4. [Apache Zeppelin Project Home Page](https://zeppelin.apache.org) - official Zeppelin web site.
%angular
%angular
